question.title: Snaps Analysis
question.metaData:
{"mysql": ["Create table if Not Exists Activities(activity_id int, user_id int, activity_type ENUM('send', 'open'), time_spent decimal(5,2))", "Create table if not Exists Age( user_id int, age_bucket ENUM('21-25','26-30','31-35'))"], "mssql": ["Create table Activities (activity_id int, user_id int, activity_type varchar(30)  NOT NULL CHECK (activity_type IN ('send','open')), time_spent decimal(5,2))", "Create table  Age( user_id int, age_bucket varchar(30) NOT NULL CHECK ( age_bucket IN ('21-25','26-30','31-35')))"], "oraclesql": ["Create table Activities (activity_id int, user_id int, activity_type varchar(30)  NOT NULL CHECK (activity_type IN ('send','open')), time_spent decimal(5,2))", "Create table  Age( user_id int, age_bucket varchar(30) NOT NULL CHECK ( age_bucket IN ('21-25','26-30','31-35')))"], "database": true, "name": "snap_analysis", "pythondata": ["Activities = pd.DataFrame([], columns=['activity_id', 'user_id', 'activity_type', 'time_spent']).astype({'activity_id':'Int64', 'user_id':'Int64', 'activity_type':'object', 'time_spent':'Float64'})
", "Age = pd.DataFrame([], columns=['user_id', 'age_bucket']).astype({'user_id':'Int64', 'age_bucket':'object'})
"], "postgresql": ["CREATE TABLE Activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL CHECK (activity_type IN ('send', 'open')),
    time_spent DECIMAL(5,2)
);", "CREATE TABLE Age (
    user_id INT,
    age_bucket VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL CHECK (age_bucket IN ('21-25', '26-30', '31-35'))
);"], "database_schema": {"Activities": {"activity_id": "INT", "user_id": "INT", "activity_type": "ENUM('send', 'open')", "time_spent": "DECIMAL(5, 2)"}, "Age": {"user_id": "INT", "age_bucket": "ENUM('21-25', '26-30', '31-35')"}}}
mysqlSchemas: Create table if Not Exists Activities(activity_id int, user_id int, activity_type ENUM('send', 'open'), time_spent decimal(5,2))
Create table if not Exists Age( user_id int, age_bucket ENUM('21-25','26-30','31-35'))
